title: Thunder Struck Hero - What's the Voice of a Dead Rock Star Doing Inside Max's Head?
description: Inspired by a dream; this story will transport you to a place and time where wishes and promises really do come true and lifeâ€™s challenges and heartaches have a happy ending. Life has an interesting way of leading us down the road we were intended to be on and at the end of this story you will feel good that you took the time along your own journey to be entertained by this fun read. The story will leave you with a sense of fulfillment and satisfaction as you move forward along the chosen path of your life (your hopes and dreams await you in the future, believe in them). Our aspiration is that you enjoy reading this story as much as we enjoyed writing it.
author: Babs Annsetti
